about_the_game:
Ancestors Legacy - Digital Artbook

A beautiful collection of concept art, 3D art and 2D art from the creators of Ancestors Legacy, shown in a Digital book of 50 pages.

Chapters:

Story: how we created the hand-drawn 2D animations for our single-player missions.
Characters: designing the compromise between historical accuracy and cool look of medieval warriors.
Environment: designing architecture and settlements to look cool and give players feeling of expansion, once they grow.
Team: the only full-team group photo we made during the development!
detailed_description:
Ancestors Legacy - Digital Artbook

A beautiful collection of concept art, 3D art and 2D art from the creators of Ancestors Legacy, shown in a Digital book of 50 pages.

Chapters:

Story: how we created the hand-drawn 2D animations for our single-player missions.
Characters: designing the compromise between historical accuracy and cool look of medieval warriors.
Environment: designing architecture and settlements to look cool and give players feeling of expansion, once they grow.
Team: the only full-team group photo we made during the development!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimální:
  • OS: Any
  • Procesor: Any
  • Paměť: 512 MB RAM
  • Grafická karta: Any
  • Pevný disk: 75 MB volného místa
  • Zvuková karta: Any sound card.
  • Dodatečné poznámky: PDF file only.

name: Ancestors Legacy - Digital Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimální:
  • OS: Any Windows
  • Procesor: Intel Atom
  • Paměť: 512 MB RAM
  • Grafická karta: Intel Graphics
  • Pevný disk: 75 MB volného místa
  • Zvuková karta: Any sound card.
  • Dodatečné poznámky: PDF file only.

short_description: The digital version of Ancestors Legacy's Artbook. It showcases the game's selected art assets, as well as describes the art direction approach and production pipelines.
supported_languages: Angličtina, Francouzština, Italština, Němčina, Evropská španělština, Čeština, Brazilská portugalština, Ruština
